data.message: When building a dashboard to visualize Duro data, the project should live inside Duro's allowed workspace (C:\Users\sibag\.agent\) for full access. The Duro MCP server is stdio-based with no HTTP API, so a FastAPI wrapper is needed to expose data to web frontends. The wrapper should import ArtifactIndex directly from duro-mcp for database queries and use read-only SQLite access to avoid lock contention with the main MCP server.
